strapiPost.title: Capitalizing On It
strapiPost.content:
Caisson Capital Partners, a new real estate investment firm based in NWA, just made its first acquisition, and it was in its own backyard.

  • What's Caisson? A firm founded in fall of 2020 aimed at expanding access to real estate investments beyond institutions to individuals.The firm will focus on investments in Northwest Arkansas and, more broadly, in the Mid-South and the American Heartland.
  • What'd they buy? The firm acquired a 96-unit multifamily apartment building called The Ridges at Bentonville in an $8.9 million deal.

If you're interested in learning more about Caisson's leadership, its strategy, or this deal in particular, you can find out more HERE.
